body:
Comment 1 by **netprobe**: 
Posting a link to strace ./mwriter:
https://gist.github.com/mulander/6124990/raw/c5efc99ac3722a83121e5a69ee5ec1ab8f45b34c/gistfile1.txt

I also reviewed sources for src/pkg/log/log.go and src/pkg/io/multi.go on both platforms
and they are bit by bit identical.

Go test passes for both packages:

mulander@craig-laptop:~/.gvm/pkgsets/go1.1.1/global/src/mwriter$ go test io
ok      io      0.023s
mulander@craig-laptop:~/.gvm/pkgsets/go1.1.1/global/src/mwriter$ go test log
ok      log     0.010s
mulander@craig-laptop:~/.gvm/pkgsets/go1.1.1/global/src/mwriter$
